text: Q u e s ti o n 3 - R e s o l u ti o n R e fu ta ti o n 3.1) W e have proved a contradiction when negating the goal. Therefore, the goal happy(john) is true. This means that John is happy . 3.2) W e can prove the un-satisfiability or contradiction of the clause.
